attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-1357

Date: 2013-12-12

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Patrick Binns, Consul General of Canada in Boston, United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($132,600 - $155,900), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Jean-Pierre Blackburn, Ambassador and Permanent Delegate of Canada to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($170,300 - $200,300), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Yves Gagnon, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Republic of Cuba, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($132,600 - $155,900), effective August 12, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Otto Jelinek, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Czech Republic, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($105,700 - $124,300), effective September 30, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Bruno Saccomani, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($132,600 - $155,900), effective August 30, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gordon Campbell, High Commissioner for Canada to the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2013.

   

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Lawrence Cannon, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the French Republic, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gary Doer, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($245,400 - $288,600), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Jonathan Fried, Ambassador and Permanent Representative of Canada to the World Trade Organization, in Geneva, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Loyola Hearn, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to Ireland, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($132,600 - $155,900), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gérard Latulippe, High Commissioner for Canada to the Republic of Trinidad and Tobago, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($169,400 - $199,200), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Jean-Carol Pelletier, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the Democratic Republic of Congo, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($118,500 - $139,300), effective April 1, 2013.

   

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of John Prato, Consul General of Canada in New York, United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($152,000 - $178,800), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Guy Saint-Jacques, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the People's Republic of China, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($190,500 - $224,100), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Andrew Peter Wallace Bennett, Ambassador for Religious Freedom, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($118,500 - $139,300), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Catherine (Cassie) Doyle, Senior Advisor to the Privy Council Office, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective April 1, 2013.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Judith Anne LaRocque, Senior Advisor to the Privy Council Office, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective April 1, 2013.
